amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding out of NOAA's Operations, Research, and Facilities Account for the Climate Portal program by $542,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce funding out of the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration Operations, Research, and Facilities account by $542,000 and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Harris amendment (A012) Agreed to by recorded vote: 219 - 189 (Roll no. 209).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Harris amendment (A012) Agreed to by recorded vote: 219 - 189 (Roll no. 209).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Harris.
